portfolio-content: Discover our ever-changing online portfolio and choose an existing piece of art. Customize it in our Make-It-Youniq-tool and we will send you an offer for the art of your dreams. Once completed you will receive your safely wrapped unique piece of art.
talent-content: Youniq.Art places artistic talent in the centre. Our artists’ names are anonymized, and their designation only shows a combination of names and surnames. You will receive your artist’s name after having commissioned art or upon request. Our artists are established international artists, art students or highly talented self-taught artists. Catch the next Picasso!
message-content: At Youniq.Art you get a first-class service, commission high-quality art and support the artists. And all this at fair and transparent conditions and prices. Even before you contact us, you can see the price range for your artwork in the Make-it-Youniq-tool.
Team von Kunsthistoriker innen: Your unique piece of art and consists of a team of art historians
aboutus_paragraph_1: Art is just as much a human need as eating and drinking, wrote Fyodor M. Dostoevsky. We are picking up on the tried and tested method of commissioned painting and transferring it into the 21st century. As a team of art historians, we have combined decades of experience in the art market and an extensive network of internationally active artists. Our aim is to make high-quality art by talented artists possible for everyone.
aboutus_paragraph_2: For centuries, commissioned works were an important part of artistic creation. Many of the works of old masters such as Michelangelo Merisi da Caravaggio, Albrecht Dürer, Peter Paul Rubens or Caspar David Friedrich that are exhibited worldwide can be traced back to commissions from influential and wealthy clients and patrons. Youniq.Art mediates between the individual wishes of art lovers and the creative freedom of artists. In doing so, the artworks are perfectly suited to the collectors. As Fjodor M. Dostojewski wrote: «Art is as much a need for humans as eating and drinking
